column2:
"Oh, <%me>.
Asuna went shopping with Matoi a little while ago."
"Haha... It must be more fun with another girl, right?"
"But since we have some time to burn, why don't we go for a Dive?"

"After all, I'm more interested in combat than shopping.
<%me>, show me a good place, alright?"

"Here's my Partner Card.
Take it and let me know when you're ready."
"You may now call Kirito as your Partner."
